MessageFormat:
Hello {0}! It's lunching time 🍟
This month you're all going for lunch together. We recommend going to {1}, but the choice is yours.
Organise a date among yourselves that works for most of your group, then choose one of you to ask the venue for their £10 lunch menu that week so you can pre-order.
Enjoy!
ReminderFormat: Reminder to get this booked in!
